Egypt, added the statement, recognized and appreciated the care accorded by Germany to the painted limestone bust of the famous ancient Egyptian queen, but added: Egypt is confident that the German authorities will assist in facilitating its return. The government and people of Egypt are eager that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people. of examples: â¢ The Debt Ceiling. The deficit and the debt are real issues, but the`` debt ceiling'' debate is political posturing. Professor Hamilton recently wrote: Debt ceiling politics If you have a concrete proposal to raise tax revenue or cut spending, then put it on the table.
